entry.title: BLOWING SNOW ADVISORY , Wunnummin Lake
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 05:12 AM CST Friday 23 December 2022

entry.title: Current Conditions: Light Snow, -19.2°C
entry.summary:
Observed at: Big Trout Lake Airport 07:56 AM CST Friday 23 December 2022
Condition: Light Snow
Temperature: -19.2°C
Pressure: 102.4 kPa
Visibility: 16.1 km
Humidity: 83 %
Dewpoint: -21.4°C
Wind: km/h
Air Quality Health Index: N/A

entry.title: Friday: Periods of snow and blowing snow. High minus 17.
entry.summary: Periods of snow and blowing snow. Amount 2 to 4 cm. Wind north 30 km/h gusting to 50. High minus 17. Wind chill minus 38 this morning and minus 29 this afternoon. Risk of frostbite. Forecast issued 05:30 AM CST Friday 23 December 2022

entry.title: Friday night: Periods of snow and blowing snow. Low minus 24.
entry.summary: Periods of snow and blowing snow. Amount 5 to 10 cm. Wind northwest 30 km/h gusting to 60. Low minus 24. Wind chill minus 30 this evening and minus 37 overnight. Risk of frostbite. Forecast issued 05:30 AM CST Friday 23 December 2022
